title: Beautiful 3 BR/2.5 BA Townhome for Rent in Hercules, CA
posting_body: ['Beautiful, Renovated, Clean, Bright & Spacious 3 Bedroom 2.5 Bath, Single Family Home for Rent in the beautiful and quiet city of Hercules, CA', 'Conveniently located between I80 and SR4 makes this is an ideal home for a busy commuter.', 'Well managed community in a nice and quiet neighborhood.', ' Close to schools and shopping centers.', 'Move-in Ready.', 'Available for rent Immediately.', 'Email to View by Appointment', 'Property Features:', '♦ 3 Bedrooms ♦ 2.5 Bathrooms', '♦ Floor Space 1,393 Sq.', 'Ft. / Lot space 2,194 Sq.', 'Ft.', '♦ Updated kitchen with granite counter tops', '♦ Updated AC unit', '♦ House comes with washer and dryer', '♦ 2-Car parking garage', '♦ Spacious Backyard (Great for Entertainment and BBQing)', '♦ Conveniently located between I80 and SR4 Freeways', '♦', 'Quiet and Friendly Neighborhood', '♦ Short drive to El Cerrito Del Notre BART', '♦ Walking distance to Parks, Schools, Restaurants', '♦ Zero-Maintenance Backyard', '♦ Heat/Cool: Ceiling Fan(s), Central Air, Central Heat, Fireplace - Wood Burning', 'Other Features:', '♦ Electric Range, Wall mounted Microwave ♦', 'Dishwasher ♦ Refrigerator ♦', 'Washer/Dryer ♦ Central AC', '♦', 'Window Covers Included, Window Screens', 'REQUIREMENTS:', '♦', 'One month rent plus one month security deposit is due at the time of signing - $8000', '♦ Minimum 1-yr Lease', '♦ Proof of Employment or Income', '♦', 'No Pets Allowed ♦', 'No indoor smoking or use of drugs', '♦ Tenant Responsible for Electricity, Water and Garbage', '♦ $30 Application fee for Credit Report (Should have good credit - mininum credit score: 685)', '♦', 'Property Available for Rent Immediately ♦ View by Appointment']
